document.full_text: skype founder niklas zennstrom said microsoft could capitalize on its $8.5 billion acquisition of the internet calling service by expanding into mobile and improving video call quality.
document.title: skype founder sees upside for microsoft after deal
lines_and_colors: skype founder niklas zennstrom said microsoft could capitalize on its $8.5 billion acquisition of the internet calling service by expanding into mobile and improving video call quality.
